                <gco:CharacterString>The HRM LakeWatchers program is community-based lake water quality monitoring program initiated by the Halifax Regional Municipality in 2022. LakeWatchers seeks to actively engage and collaborate with community volunteers in the collection of lake water quality data at 72 lakes across the region.</gco:CharacterString>

name: 10-25976-85pw-zj92
notes: The HRM LakeWatchers program is community-based lake water quality monitoring program initiated by the Halifax Regional Municipality in 2022. LakeWatchers seeks to actively engage and collaborate with community volunteers in the collection of lake water quality data at 72 lakes across the region.

notes_translated.en: The HRM LakeWatchers program is community-based lake water quality monitoring program initiated by the Halifax Regional Municipality in 2022. LakeWatchers seeks to actively engage and collaborate with community volunteers in the collection of lake water quality data at 72 lakes across the region.
notes_translated.fr: Le programme HRM LakeWatchers est un programme communautaire de surveillance de la qualité de l'eau des lacs lancé par la municipalité régionale d'Halifax en 2022. LakeWatchers cherche à s'engager activement et à collaborer avec des bénévoles communautaires dans la collecte de données sur la qualité de l'eau des lacs dans 72 lacs de la région.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: HRM LakeWatchers

title_translation_method.fr: Title text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate
